not_an_fbx_error: This is not an fbx file
source_fbx.tooltip: FBX file used as the source for BlendShapes.
extractor.weld_vertices.tooltip: The BlendShape offset of vertices that will be combined by the Unity model importer will be set to the same value, ensuring that vertices remains consistent with the original mesh.
extractor.apply_transform.tooltip: Apply the Object's transform to the meshes before calculating the BlendShapes vertices' offsets. If orientation issues occur with the BlendShapes, try enabling 'Apply Rotation' to correct them.
extractor.base_mesh.tooltip: Base mesh for calculating BlendShapes offset vertices
extractor.enum.compare_method.name: Name
extractor.enum.compare_method.name.toolt: Compare by name. If there are new blendshapes in the Source FBX, BlendShare will extract them.
extractor.enum.compare_method.index.tool: Compare by index. If there are more blendshapes than the Original FBX, BlendShare will extract blendshapes from the tail end.
extractor.enum.compare_method.custom.too: Toggle which blendshapes should be extracted individually.
data.original_fbx.tooltip: Original FBX GameObject asset used to generate meshes.
data.apply_blendshapes.tooltip: Add BlendShapes in the list to Original FBX.
data.apply_blendshapes.tooltip_locked_me: (Currently this button is disable since you are already apply BlendShapes to Fbx. Click Edit to force enable
data.apply_blendshapes_as_new_fbx.toolti: Duplicate Original FBX and apply BlendShapes to the copy.
data.remove_blendshapes.tooltip: Remove BlendShapes in the list from Origin FBX.
data.remove_blendshapes.tooltip_locked_m: (Currently this button is disable since you are not apply BlendShapes to Fbx yet. Click Edit to force enable)
data.hidden_settings.applied.tooltip: Indicate if user has applied BlendShapes to FBX.
data.create_meshes.tooltip: Create new mesh assets with BlendShapes.
data.open_advanced_generator.tooltip: Open the Advanced BlendShape Generator to create a new mesh that combines BlendShapes from multiple BlendShape data assets.
data.dialog.fbx_missing.title: Original FBX is missing.
data.dialog.fbx_missing.message: The original FBX file is missing. Please import the asset or assign an FBX to 'Original FBX'.
data.dialog.apply_blendshapes.title: Apply BlendShapes
data.dialog.apply_blendshapes.message: This will add the listed BlendShapes to the original GameObject. Continue?
data.dialog.remove_blendshapes.title: Remove BlendShapes
data.dialog.remove_blendshapes.message: This will remove the listed BlendShapes from the original GameObject. Continue?
mesh_asset.read_only: Fields are read-only. Press 'Edit' to modify metadata.
mesh_asset.assign_meshes.is_prefab:
The selected object is a prefab.
Editing this object will modify the prefab itself, not a scene instance.
Do you want to continue editing the prefab asset directly?
mesh_asset.assign_meshes.dialog.is_fbx.m:
The selected object is an FBX asset.
FBX assets are read-only and cannot be edited directly.
Please instantiate the FBX in the scene to make modifications.
mesh_asset.fbx_edited:
The FBX asset has been modified since these meshes were generated.
Changes to the FBX might cause unexpected results when regenerating or applying new blend shapes.
mesh_generator.target_mesh_container.too: Reference base model to which BlendShapes will be added. The asset can be an FBX model, a mesh asset generated by BlendShare, or an Unity mesh.
mesh_generator.mesh_generation_disable: This asset cannot be used to generate a mesh asset because the vertex order is incorrect. Please use an FBX file instead.
mesh_generator.blendshapes_data_list.too: All listed BlendShapes will be merged and applied to a single model.
